source:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Ogul is looking around in trepidation.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
イェドリマンのオグルは、怯えているようだ。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_01Horrified at landing on an isle populated by Matanga, Ogul is desperate to earn enough coin to buy passage on a departing ship. She asks that you accompany her to Kancana, a woman who purportedly has well-paying jobs on offer.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

オグルと話した。マタンガ族に怯える彼女は、島外へ出るための船賃を稼ぎたいようだ。サベネア島のイェドリマンで「オグル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_02<tab>You approach Kancana who, much to Ogul's dismay, is a Matanga herself. Despite Ogul's fearful reaction, you nevertheless secure an escort duty which requires you to meet an Arkasodara master artisan to the west of Yedlihmad.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_02<tab>オグルたちと話した。イェドリマン西の「アルカソーダラ族の職人長」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_03<tab>The master artisan welcomes your somewhat belated arrival. Before he can give you instructions, however, Ogul decides that rushing off to gather materials herself would be best for everyone involved. You are left to conduct a patrol of the area alone, but deem it wise to keep one eye peeled for the unsteady Auri warrior.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_03<tab>アルカソーダラ族の職人長と話した。イェドリマン北で「オグル」を探そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_04<tab>You come across a petrified Ogul standing motionless between a raging beast and one of the aforementioned artisans. After making short work of the aggressive wildlife, you turn your attention to the wounded Arkasodara.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_04<tab>オグルを見つけて、現れた魔物を討伐した。イェドリマン北で「負傷したアルカソーダラ族」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_05<tab>The Arkasodara insists that his injuries are slight, and that he is fit to make the journey back towards town. Return to the master artisan west of Yedlihmad.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_05<tab>負傷したアルカソーダラ族を救助した。イェドリマン西で「アルカソーダラ族の職人長」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_06<tab>Your employer thanks you for saving his colleague. Your payment, it seems, can be collected from Kancana back in Yedlihmad proper.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_06<tab>アルカソーダラ族の職人長と話した。イェドリマンの「カーンチャナ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_07<tab>You receive your promised reward from Kancana, as well as her heartfelt approval. The offer of future work hangs in the air, but considering Ogul's deep-seated fear of all things Matanga, you wonder if she might not require your continued assistance...
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_07<tab>カーンチャナに報告した。オグルのマタンガ族への恐怖は、かなり根深いようだ。危なっかしい彼女に、しばらく付き合ってあげよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_08<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SEQ_08<tab>

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ogul.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_00<tab>オグルと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the master artisan west of Yedlihmad.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_01<tab>アルカソーダラ族の職人長と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_02<tab>Search for Ogul.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_02<tab>オグルを探す

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_03<tab>Aid the wounded Arkasodara.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_03<tab>負傷したアルカソーダラ族を救助

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the master artisan.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_04<tab>アルカソーダラ族の職人長と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_05<tab>Report to Kancana.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_TODO_05<tab>カーンチャナに報告

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_000<tab>...Why are there Matanga everywhere!? Has this town fallen...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_000ううっ、なんでマタンガ族がこんなに……
ここは人の街じゃないのかよぉ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_001<tab>Ah! Your face─it is known to me! You were the warrior who fought for the Mol in the Naadam!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_001あ、ああっ！
知ってるぞ、のこと！
終節の合戦で、モル族と一緒に戦ってたよな！？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_002<tab>I am Ogul of the Khatayin. It was your bravery and skill which inspired me to embark upon my own hero's journey.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_002私は、カタイン族のオグルだ！
みたいな、旅しながら人助けする冒険者になりたくて、
故郷を飛び出してきたんだけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_003<tab>Yet now I have foolishly blundered into a den of Matanga. Why do these others walk without fear? Do they not care if they are slaughtered!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_003ここ、マタンガ族の街なのか？
見つかったら、アウラ族は皆殺しにされるんじゃないのか！？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_Q1_000_004<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_Q1_000_004<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_A1_000_001<tab>These Matanga are not like those on the Azim Steppe.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_A1_000_001<tab>アジムステップのマタンガ族とは違うらしいぞ

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_A1_000_002<tab>The Arkasodara are a civilized tribe.
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_A1_000_002<tab>アルカソーダラ族は文明的だから……

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_005<tab>I do not doubt your word. But Grandmother would always warn me: “If you encounter a Matanga, you turn tail and flee─as fast and far as you can!”
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_005そ、そうなのか……？
けどさ、ばあちゃんも言ってたんだ。
「マタンガ族を見たら、地平線の向こうまで逃げろ」って！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_006<tab>Her tales were awful and bloody, and so now the very sight of them, it... The terror rises unbidden! No, I cannot stay here. I must earn enough coin to buy passage from this nightmare island as soon as possible!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_006ああ、ダメだ……理屈ぬきで、怖いもんは怖い！
いますぐ船賃を稼いで、こんな恐怖の島から逃げてやる！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_007<tab>I beg of you, stay at my side for a time─just until I meet with this “Kancana” person the sailors told me about. She is said to have work that pays a fair wage, so I will see what she has for me...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_007なあ頼むよ、少しだけ一緒にいてくれないか！？
船乗りたちから、仕事の斡旋人の名前は聞いてるんだ！
「カーンチャナ」ってヤツのところまで、付き合って……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_100_008<tab>Why is that young lady trembling so...?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_100_008<tab>そこに隠れている子、どうしたのかしらね……？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_008<tab>
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_008<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_100_010<tab>By the Dusk Mother! No one told me Kancana was a Matanga! Could I ask you to speak with her in my stead...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_100_010ごめん……
私の代わりに、カーンチャナと話してくれないか？
まさか、斡旋人がマタンガ族なんて思わなくてさぁ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_010<tab>Welcome to Yedlihmad, traveler. I am Kancana, and it is my job to assign the right work to the right workers. Might I have your name?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_010イェドリマンへようこそ、旅の方。
私は仕事の斡旋人をしている、カーンチャナ。
あなたたち、お名前は？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_011<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...and Ogul, was it? Let me jot those down.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_011)) (( )) 02 /var>とオグルね。
覚えておくわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_012<tab>Oh, Grandmother, why!? Why did it have to be a Matanga!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_012どぉして、仕事くれる人までマタンガ族なんだ！？
助けて、ばあちゃん！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_013<tab>...Is your companion quite alright?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_013<tab>……その子、どうしちゃったの？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_014<tab>Ah, an understandable reaction. The Gajasura tribe have done much to stain the reputation of our people.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_014なるほど、ガジャースラ族のせいで……
アルカソーダラ族にとっては風評被害もいいところね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_015<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> looking for work, though, yes? Many have been forced to take what they can get since the troubles began, so I'm afraid all the simple jobs are gone.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_015それで、仕事をお探し？
不況のあおりで、職を失った住民が多くてね、
簡単な仕事はほとんど、彼らが終わらせているのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_016<tab>As for what's left, I only have tasks fit for seasoned fighters. Does that sound like something you could do?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_016だから、戦える人向けの依頼しか残っていないの。
それでもいい？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_017<tab>F-Fighting? I can fight! Lest you doubt, my skill is likened to that of the Dragonbane─the legendary Chakha Zoh herself!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_017う、腕っぷしなら自信あるぞ！
ばあちゃんも「お前は竜退治のチャカに似てる」って言ってたしな！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_018<tab>I'm...not familiar with the name, but you sound formidable indeed. Why don't we start you out on escort duty, then. A group of artisans set off to harvest materials, and asked that I send any prospective protectors their way should I happen to enlist any.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_018そのチャカっていう人が何かはわからないけど……
腕に覚えがあるなら、採集に出た職人の護衛を頼める？
護衛役が見つかったら、後からでも来てほしいと言っていたわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_019<tab>What? They already set off? Is our duty not to “escort” them?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_019<tab>え、もう出発した後なのか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_000<tab>There's to be a ritual dance performed in Kadjaya's Footsteps─they'll need incense, and costumes for the dancers and such. The entire thing was decided rather suddenly, so there was no time to waste.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_000カジャーヤ演舞場で、舞いの奉納をおこなうことになってね。
そこで使う香や、踊り子たちの衣装を仕立てるとかで、
急いでいるようだったわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_020<tab>Hmmm...
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_020<tab>ふうん……

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_021<tab>And, uh, these artisans you speak of...d-do they also include Matanga in their number?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_021と、ところで質問！
そこにマタンガ族は！？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_022<tab>It was an Arkasodara who submitted the request. I hope that won't be a problem...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_022依頼主がアルカソーダラ族よ。
がんばって！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_023<tab><gulp> Oh, not at all. I look forward to fainting at the feet of my most feared enemy!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_023うぐ……
会ったら、間違いなく失神する！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_024<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I cannot do this alone. Pray lend me the strength of the victor of the Naadam, and half the reward for this task will be yours!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_024、一生のお願いだから一緒に来て！
報酬は半分こしよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_025<tab>The artisans didn't plan to venture far─leave Yedlihmad to the west, and you should soon come across your employer.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_025依頼主の「アルカソーダラ族の職人長」には、
イェドリマンを出て西へ歩けば会えるはずよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_026<tab>Then that is where we shall meet! You will find me there, yes...?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_026よーし、現地で合流だ！
ちゃ、ちゃんと来てよ……？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_027<tab>As I said, they shouldn't be far─a short walk from the west edge of town.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_027依頼主の「アルカソーダラ族の職人長」には、
イェドリマンを出て西へ歩けば会えるはずよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_028<tab>Dusk Mother, give me courage!
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_028<tab>ぐぬ～！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_030<tab>Ah, you must be our belated escort, yes?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_030<tab>おや、もしかして護衛の件かな？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_031<tab>Glad to have such courageous...uh...is your companion not well? She seems a touch shaky.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_031それはありがたいけど……連れのお嬢さん、大丈夫？
具合でも悪いのかな。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_032<tab>Of course─I should have thought of it before! I shall harvest the necessary ingredients while the artisan stays here. That way I have no need to fear him...er, being harmed! Perfect!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_032閃いた……！
私が採集してくれば、怖くないし安全だし、最高なんじゃ！？
よし、職人さんは待ってて！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_033<tab>I must say, this is less than ideal. My people are already scattered across the wilds, and I wanted someone to roam around and ensure they were safe from attack...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_033みんな、もう採集しに散っているから、
魔物が近づかないよう、見回ってほしかったんだけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_034<tab>Is your friend perhaps frightened by Arkasodara? I have met such travelers before. Well, no matter. If you could patrol the area as I asked, I must attend to my own harvesting.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_034彼女、もしかしてアルカソーダラ族が怖いの？
島外から来た人には、たまにいるんだよね……。
まあともかく、俺も採集にいくから、君は見回りを頼むよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>Ogul has run off into the wilds alone. Keep an eye out for her as you continue your patrol.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_SYSTEM_000_035「オグル」が心配だ。
見回りがてら、行方を探してみよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_036<tab>T-Tusks, trunks, bone-crunching feet...
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_036<tab>おち、おちつ……いて……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANB04489_000_040<tab>You must think me foolish. I was so absorbed in my task that I failed to notice the ground shaking at their approach...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANB04489_000_040ありがとう……
採集に夢中で、魔物に気づかなかった。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANB04489_000_041<tab>Still, my injuries are light and my satchel is full. Thanks to you, I think I can make it back to town in time to meet the others.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANB04489_000_041怪我は大したことないし、採集も済んだから、
職人長へ報告に戻るとするよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_042<tab><gasp> I... What happened!?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_042……はっ！
意識飛んでた！！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_100_042<tab>Did <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> slay the beast?
target: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_100_042<tab>もしかして、魔物を倒してくれた？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_043<tab>That was a near thing. I took the first one by surprise, but the second... Knowing a Matanga stood at my back, my mind froze and my body refused to obey.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_043助かったぁ。
片方は不意打ちで倒せたけど、
背後にマタンガ族がいると思ったら、身体が固まっちゃって……

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_044<tab>Grandmother taught that we should let fear wash over us like water, but to my shame, I could not have failed her more thoroughly. ...Not to sound ungrateful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but why did you follow me?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_044ばあちゃんも「心は流れる水のように」って、
言ってたのに大失態だなぁ、反省、反省……。
ところで、なんでここに？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_045<tab>...We were to patrol? Forgive me. I should have waited for orders, instead of running off alone and putting lives in peril.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_045え、見回りをしてほしいって言ってた？
そっか、ひとりで突っ走って迷惑かけて、ごめん……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_046<tab>Come, we should return to our employer─I want to be sure that the wounded man reached safety.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_046助けた職人が、ちゃんと引き返せたのかも気になるし、
ひとまず「アルカソーダラ族の職人長」のところまで戻ろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_047<tab>D-Deep breaths! Let it wash over you!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_047ふーっ！　ふーっ！
怖くない、怖くない、怖くない……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_050<tab>My colleague told me of his rescue. Although we had hoped for an escort from the start, imagine if you hadn't come at all...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_050見回りおつかれさま。
仲間を助けてくれたんだって？
本人から聞いたよ、世話になったね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_051<tab>I've sent him and the others back to our workshop, so consider your duty with us complete.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_051彼も含め、職人たちは引き揚げていったから、
俺も、そろそろ戻ることにするよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_052<tab>You have my thanks. As for your payment, that you can collect from Kancana.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_ARTISANA04489_000_052報酬は、カーンチャナから受け取ってくれ。
ふたりとも、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_053<tab>Right... I suppose we report to Kancana, then.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_053ふー……
イェドリマンに戻って、「カーンチャナ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_054<tab>I had no such troubles in Doma or Kugane, I assure you. This is...different.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_OGUL_000_054ドマやクガネでは、
ちゃんと依頼をこなせてたんだ……本当だぞ？

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_060<tab>Ah, there you are. Your employer expressed satisfaction with your work, so congratulations on a job well done!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_060おかえりなさい、ふたりとも！
さっき、職人長からお礼を言われたわよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_061<tab>As a response to the recent chaos, the upcoming ritual was hastily planned to say the least. As a consequence, the artisans have been hard-pressed to make everything ready.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_061彼らがやろうとしている奉納はね、
最近いろいろとあったから、急遽決まったみたいなの。
だから、少しバタついてしまって、苦労をかけてしまったわね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_062<tab>But when times are hard, the people of Thavnair rely on such traditions to renew their faith and bolster their hearts with the teachings of the divine.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_062困難を前にしたとき、サベネア島の住人は、
奉納の儀式を通じて、いまいちど神獣様の訓えを胸に刻むの。
そうして心を奮い立たせるというわけ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_063<tab>The death of an artisan would have thrown the whole thing into disarray, and thus your rescue was timely indeed! Please, accept your payment─half each, as agreed upon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_063ふたりのおかげで、無事に奉納できそうで良かったわ。
本当に、ありがとう……！
報酬はしっかり半分ずつ支払わせてもらうわね！

source: TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_064<tab>Are you interested in further work? I may have something for you, if so...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZA201_04489_KANCANA_000_064ところで……もうひとつ依頼を受ける気はない？
興味があるなら、また声をかけてちょうだいね。
